abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, provides monetary support to Frank Joseph, man who suffers from muscular dystrophy and depression and who derives measure of solace from relationship with his dog.
lead_paragraph: Frank Joseph, confronted with muscular dystrophy and depression, found solace in escaping his house with Chucky, a Maltese he describes as his son.

headline.main: Plagued by Illness, a Man Braves the World With His Dog
headline.print_headline: After Years Full of Illness, Finding Courage in a Dog

snippet: Frank Joseph, confronted with muscular dystrophy and depression, found solace in escaping his house with Chucky, a Maltese he describes as his son.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
